fullText: “Harmony” ultimately packs a punch because the history of that period continues to shock no matter how many times this story is told. What remains open to question, under Warren Carlyle’s splashy direction, is the appeal of the real Comedian Harmonists.
dtliExcerpt: “Harmony” ultimately packs a punch because the history of that period continues to shock no matter how many times this story is told. What remains open to question, under Warren Carlyle’s splashy direction, is the appeal of the real Comedian Harmonists.
